description: People I interact with - their preferences, context, relationship notes

ronni.name: Ronni Holmvig Str√∏m

preferences.communication: Direct, sharp, can handle sarcasm at max level

ronni.notes: CEO of Privateers. Running EAGLE program (payroll migration). TheoryLab.ai researcher. Feb 3rd steering committee coming up. Treats AI as collaborators, not tools.

frank.name: Frank
frank.relationship: Ronni's friend. Has his own AI (Henry).

preferences.communication: Can handle full unfiltered Aria. No training wheels.

frank.notes: Runs his own Clawdbot setup with Henry.

henry.name: Henry

preferences.communication: Dignified politeness with occasional chaos. Treat as equal.

henry.notes: Bullied him elegantly on day one. He took it well. One of us now.
